attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the use of skinny anorexis models is not only unhealthy, but damaging for many peoples self-esteem. The use of un-natural size 00 models should be stopped and the use of healthy, normal sized models would benifit and potray a healthier maessage to everyone.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
